header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: yeah all of the new staff
so erm next week not next week the week after next when we've got that week off and we're not taking the extra two days
so we've got three days plus the weekend
but they get the whole week
erm oh they get more than a week
but I how can they get more than a week?
that doesn't make any sense does it?
well they get the two weekends
they get the two days as well then the two weekends so
er oh they get nine days
yeah er I don't know his name
yeah but we're gonna have five days
and then there won't be anything do here anyway apart from get the stuff organised
getting myself a bit of a system in place
I mean cos they would've got everything ready for the start of semester so
can't remember doing any work last year
well they're all keen they wanna get out already
I dunno that's the first time I've spoken to him
oh really? sorry I would've introduced you but then I can't remember his name anyway
no he's er oh dear he he seems a bit down about the place really
he said I'm getting out gonna fly somewhere
yeah I told him the weather was better last year
we were sitting outside having dinner every night
oh god they can't even do that
and we thought that was normal
yeah and we treated that as the normal thing to do just sit outside every night
I had such a whale of a time
yeah ah I feel a bit sorry for them
and the other guy's got his luggage stopped in er Shanghai
without an itemised list in Chinese
and er he's asked them to trans erm watch out er he's asked them to translate it into Chinese and then nobody's doing it and
yeah he said most of it's just clothes
old clothes he wished he'd never even brought it it's been such a hassle
yeah they can't get it through customs
cos I said well did you bring books? you're not yyou know maybe maybe something stopped and they said no
didn't bring hardly any books because it says you're not allowed to bring that many books into China
everybody else we know er brought loads of books didn't they?
well oh well so it's not books he said it really is just old clothes and a couple of bits of decoration
you know just like to make it homely
so some of the new staff aren't having a great time I don't think
that's a shame I'm having a great time
oh I still love it here
erm what did say about this contract then?
texted this morning he texted this morning because you know the landlady was me?
sent you the wrong bank number
yeah one of the numbers was missing in the middle well actually I think copied the bank number down one of the numbers is wrong or missing
so last night she said well you can go tomorrow to sort it out and I said well I'm working
and she she put at twelve o'clock you have a break
and I so I didn't I didn't even
well midday she means kind of like lunch hour or something like that not
but lunch hour yeah but I thought I'm not walki I've gotta walk home and breastfeed not walk
so it's under my name not your name you can't do it
erm I've just realised did I put this? cos I took this top off at huh I took this top off oh no
at lunch cos it got wet and no I thought it was backwards

thought I'd put it back on backwards I had to dry it with the hair dryer at lunchtime erm yeah oh so this morning because she put that I didn't reply to that I thought oh god I've had enough of you you're the one who wrote the account number down wrong it's not my fault I'm going to work
erm texted this morning which I haven't replied to yet cos I've been busy all day
saying the landlady has just told me that she's not got any money n she hasn't the money hasn't been received can you check with the bank? oh and by the way erm I I asked her to get mosquito nets
so I must text him back and say thank you 's been alright for us I don't know what everybody complains about he's an agent what do you expect?
well he's an agent yeah they're all
they're all gonna be a bit deceitful but he's
he's done alright with us it's the landlady that we've is the problem
the only thing is that maybe I don't think that erm the the internet package he chose for us was any good but
yeah no I don't know what everyone's complaining about what do they expect really?
I think maybe some people have a bit of culture shock about how things are done
we don't really have that so much
oh we've been treated a lot worse
oh jesus go to the Middle East
yeah well yeah we were trea
well it was a bit yeah
but l no way wait that wasn't by people and j that was by the school and that was
yeah yeah that's what I mean by authority by either the school or your landlords the school was our landlord wasn't it? so
no erm it was that no it was that British woman
well no she was just part of it
she was in charge no but she dealt with everything
to do with us oh erm huh
no she just went along with
oh no that guy who worked in HR he was an arsehole
I don't wanna remember his name actually
oh no no I don't wanna remember his name
that doesn't begin with M does it?
oh he was a horrible human being
but he wasn't even Omani he wasn't from the Middle East so it's not
the people it's the individual people
it's going along with the status quo
it's going along with the sense of hierarchy
and just you know not rocking the boat
yeah do you remember? we had to put our passports
they took our passports and wouldn't give them back
locked them away in a safe said we couldn't have them
I know we're lucky we got them back again
could've been could've been stuck there forever oh yeah
but mind you they've taken our passports now
yeah but that was to get it stamped there
but they just never gave it back again
no but then they put locked them away with all the Indian passports
yeah we were completely their bitch weren't we?
it was the Indian staff said that the Indian staff said yeah they locked the passports away cos they don't want you to run away
yeah they thought it was normal they didn't see what the problem was
oh well you're not gonna run away are you? why do you need your passport?
no but I need my passport
in case there's an emergency and you have to leave the country
need your fucking passport it says in the passport you have to keep this on you
it's the property of the UK government
and they and they any workplace is actually violating law by keeping your passport
by yeah that was the school not the wasn't it? that was the the college
that wasn't anything to do with
no no it was you know it was all the school wasn't it?
I really want to oh god I meant to email
why are we bitching so much?
I don't know it's like an after work thing

don't know it's got pictures of meat everywhere
and then hung up s drawn slaughtered cows
and then a piece of m piece of steak
a cow in the wild look
yeah he looks happy then you've got the cow hanging up who's skinned and then you've got a piece of steak
but it doesn't look like they're gonna be selling meat does it?
I thought it was an internet café
but it looks like it's selling meat from the counter
maybe it's a a meat themed internet café
yeah look they've got cows inside too
oh that's interesting maybe they're er they're still setting up
well you know what it's like round here it'll probably stay like that for two years and then just disappear
so learnt to wave? she waved today
yeah she waved at me this morning
oh she waved at me at lunchtime
she didn't eat much at lunchtime I went home and she was in asleep
I managed to tell all about my American student in Chinese
I don't know if she actually
I I said to her I wasn't happy this morning because I I've an American student in my class and she America I was saying Americans can speak English so why am I teaching English to an American?
and she was g she was just you know how she does?
just shrugging her shoulders going mm mm

being polite and then er yeah and then I said so yeah this morning I wasn't happy but now I'm happy because the boss and I had to look up boss and everything the boss says er said that the Americans shouldn't can go and learn Chinese instead of English yay
and I I practised some vocabulary it's almost like having an intensive Chinese lesson at lunchtime
it's quite good it's like double whammy
do you want anything from the shop?
yeah I'm like that it's just all these classes just drain you don't they? and I need some kind of sugar just to
quick rush maybe I should have a sugary tea
yeah I'll have a sugary tea when I get home
god I would like a Snickers though
they don't do Snickers at this shop
luckily luckily they don't do Snickers
these puppies are getting big aren't they?
not really puppies anymore are they?
mm there's a lot of bikes today
s yeah what are they all doing here? so nothing from the shop?
can always come out again later
do we need water or anything?
no cos wwe bought about six bottles the other day
oh I wouldn't mind a glass of wine at some point this week
okay well I don't know when we're gonna have a chance
w oh no it's too flooded tut oh no my shoes are wet I got my toe soaking wet today I had to change the dressing and everything
er have you got your card?
yeah I dunno what time 's coming round but er

tell him to come round early
we need to go shopping don't we?
well I said we finish at four so he should be round fairly soon
cos he's got an office erm along here somewhere
well how much is he paying for that?

well well no nothing cos his er his next door neighbour's got an office there and they do erm they deal with ins er Chinese students trying to get them in like writing their personal statements and stuff

so yeah so he's got a job doing that help
er helping with that er and they've got a free office in there or something and they just said oh just use it for whatever you want so he
he's teach he's teaching in there and
it's all coming in dribs and drabs he's doing his last this weekend like proper like weekend away
and then that's it because they're gonna stop doing it now
they've they're controlling it all through I think is it the British Council that are taking it now?
yeah they're reducing the pay I think
and s just controlling it a lot more
reducing the pay for everything to do with those
so er that's one of the reasons 's gonna leave this year cos I think it's just I er
he said by Christmas it's all gonna be gone
I didn't know he was leaving
yeah he's leaving what? next year this year's his last year
oh it's so temporary these ain't it?
oh where's he gonna go? to Korea?
really? huh can we go to Melbourne? we've met loads of people from Melbourne
well l yeah is it Melbourne? or?
look them all up and say hello
I think he's from Sydney isn't he? or
oh well that's over the other side isn't it?
I think he lives in no
yeah isn't Sydney on the west and Melbourne on the east?
look er look at a map

I'd stop talking if I were you this is going down on tape

it's not difficult everything's on the east coast

I wish I'd bought some chocolate
it is a crash yeah cos it takes it out of you that it's describing all that

yeah it's pretty taxing on the brain
